Title: An Implementation of Just-in-Time Fault-Prone Prediction Technique Using Text Classifier
Elements_risk_assessment: The BIC could be not the one that SZZ flag
UseOF-SZZ: To attache FIX tags to the commits which remove faults and BUG tags to the commits which induce faults
Summary: Building a prototype fault-prone module prediction tool using a text-filtering based technique named (Fault Prone Filtering)
Outcome: The tool could detect 90 percent of the actual fault modules (i.e., the recall of 0.9) with the accuracy of 0.67 and the precision of 0.63 on average
